column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: sɛ itsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne ndze yie
column4: dɛ ebɔdwen do ayɛ ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara a
column5: EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛma wo do akɔ sor asen asaase do amanaman nyinara:"

column2: "na nhyira yi nyinara bɛba wo do
column3: na wɔabɔto wo
column4: osiandɛ itsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ndze."

column2: "Nhyira bɛka wo wɔ kurow mu
column3: na nhyira aka wo wɔ haban mu."

column2: "Nhyira bɛka wo honam mu aba
column3: na w’asaase do aba

column2: "Nhyira bɛka wo kɛntsɛn nye wo mbɔrkorow."
"Nhyira bɛka wo wɔ wo fie ba mu
column3: na nhyira bɛka wo wɔ w’edzifir mu."

column2: "EWURADZE bɛma w’atamfo a wɔsoɛr wo do no edzi nkogu wɔ w’enyim: wɔnam ɔkwan kor do bɛba wo do
column3: na wɔnam akwan esuon do eguan wɔ w’enyim."

column2: "EWURADZE bɛhyɛ ma nhyira aba wo do wɔ w’asan do
column3: na dza edze wo nsa bɛka nyinara mu; na obehyira wo wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do."

column2: "Sɛ idzi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne mbransɛm do
column3: na enantsew n’akwan do a EWURADZE dze wo betsim hɔ ma aayɛ ɔman krɔnkrɔn ama noara
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka ntam akyerɛ wo no."

column2: "Na asaase do aman nyinara bohu dɛ wɔdze EWURADZE dzin afrɛ wo; na wobosuro wo."
"Na EWURADZE bɛma yie ebu wo do
column3: wɔ wo honam mu aba mu
column6: wɔ asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ w’egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma wo no do."

column2: "EWURADZE bobue ɔsor n’adzepa korabea no ama wo na ɔaama w’asaase do nyankom atɔ wɔ n’aber mu
column3: na oeehyira wo nsaano edwuma nyinara do: na edze bɛfɛm amanaman pii

column2: "sɛ itsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi dɛ ebɔdwen do ayɛ a
column3: EWURADZE bɛma akɔ kan na ennkɛka ekyir; na ɔwo bɔbɔ do ara nko

column2: "Ne dɛm ntsi mma nndan mmfi nsɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi ho
column3: mmfa enyimfa
column5: nnkɔ nnkedzi enyame fofor ekyir nnkɔsom hɔn."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: sɛ enntsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne ndze dɛ ebɔdwen do edzi ne mbransɛm nye n’ahyɛdze a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara do a; mpaa yi nyinara bɛba wo do

column2: "Mpaa bɛka wo wɔ kurow mu
column3: na mpaa aka wo wɔ haban mu."

column2: "Mpaa bɛka wo kɛntsɛn
column3: nye wo mbɔrkorow."

column2: "Mpaa bɛka wo honam mu aba
column3: nye w’asaase mu aba

column2: "Mpaa bɛka wo wɔ wo fie ba mu
column3: na mpaa bɛka wo wɔ w’edzifir mu."

column2: "EWURADZE bɛma mpaa
column3: nkogu
column5: wɔ dza edze wo nsa bɛka ayɛ nyinara mu
column7: na ayew ntsɛm; osian wo ndzeyɛɛ a enam do apow me ntsi."

column2: "EWURADZE bɛma ɔyardɔm afam wo ho
column3: dze ekodu dɛ ɔahyew wo efi asaase a erokɔ do akɛfa no do."

column2: "EWURADZE dze asasawaw
column3: nye etsiridii
column8: nye ɔpo bɔbɔ wo; na wobetsiw wo araa ekodu dɛ ebɛsɛɛ."

column2: "Na ɔsor bɛyɛ dɛ boran ama wo
column3: na asaase adan dadze ama wo."

column2: "EWURADZE bɛma etudur na huntuma atɔ dɛ nsu egu wo do araa ekodu dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ wo."
"EWURADZE bɛma edzi w’atamfo enyim ɔkogu: enam ɔkwan kor do befir edzi ekehyia hɔn
column3: na enam akwan esuon do eguan wɔ hɔn enyim: na wobedzi wo akɔnaaba wɔ asaase do ahendzi nyinara mu."

column2: "Na wo fun bɛyɛ wimu ntumbowa nyinara
column3: nye asaase do mbowa edziban

column2: "EWURADZE dze Egypt pɔmpɔ
column3: tukuruw
column5: nye ntwem a worunntum wo eduyɛ bɔbobɔ wo."

column2: "EWURADZE dze abɔdam
column3: nye enyifura
column4: nye akoma mu ahodwuruw bɔbɔ wo;"

column2: "na ebɛkeka ewiaber ketee
column3: dɛ ofurafo rekeka wɔ sum mu
column4: na w’akwan mu rennyɛ wo yie: na ɔhyɛ nko na wɔbɛhyɛ wo na wɔafow wo dabaa

column2: "Ebɛgye ayewar
column3: na ɔbanyin fofor bi nye no ada: ibesi dan
column4: na erenntsena mu: ebɛtsɛw wenyin ture

column2: "Woboku wo nantwi wɔ w’enyim
column3: na irinndzi bi: wɔbɛfa w’asoaso enyimpi do wɔ w’enyim
column4: na wɔrenndan mma wo: wɔdze wo nguan bɛma w’atamfo na innkenya obi ma ɔaagye wo."

column2: "Wɔdze wo mbabanyin nye wo mbabaa bɛma ɔman fofor bi na w’enyiwa bɔhwɛ
column3: na hɔn ho enyigyinae egura wo daa nyinara: na tum biara nnyi wo nsamu."

column2: "W’asaase do aba
column3: nye w’edwumadze nyinara
column4: na ɔman a innyim hɔn bedzi; na ɔhyɛ nko na wɔbɛhyɛ wo na wɔadwerew wo dabaa:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi w’enyiwa do adze a ibohu no bɔbɔ wo dam."
"EWURADZE dze pɔmpɔ bɔn bɔbɔ wo wɔ anankoroma
column3: nye aserɛ do a worunntum wo eduyɛ

column2: "EWURADZE dze ɔwo
column3: nye wo hen a ibesi no wo do no
column4: bɔkɔ ɔman a ɔwo nye w’egyanom nnyim no mu; na hɔ na ebɔsom enyame fofor

column2: "Na ebɛdan ahodwuruwdze
column3: akasabɛbu
column5: wɔ aman a EWURADZE bɛma akɔ no nyinara mu."

column2: "Ebɔsoa aba pii akɔ haban mu
column3: na kakrabaabi na ebɔboa ano aba fie; na mbɛbɛw bedzi."

column2: "Ebɛtsetsɛw wenyin nture na esiesie mu
column3: na ne nsa dze eronnom
column4: na erenntsew esikyireamba no so; na mbowaba bedzi."

column2: "Ibenya ngodua wɔ wo ntoado nyinara
column3: na ngo no dze erennsera woho bi; na wo ngodua no bɔporow n’aba."

column2: "Ebɔwo mbabanyin nye mbabaa
column3: na wɔrennyɛ wodze; na wɔbɔkɔ ndɔmmum mu."

column2: "Wo ndua nyinara nye w’asaase do aba no mbɛbɛw bɛfa."
"Ɔhɔho a ɔwɔ wo mu bɛkyɛn wo akɔ sorsorsor; na ɔwo dze ibesian aba famufamu."
"Ɔno na ɔdze bɛfɛm wo
column3: na ɔwo dze
column4: irinnya mmfɛm no: ɔno na ɔbɔkɔ kan

column2: "Na mpaa yi nyinara bɛba wo do
column3: na woetsiw wo
column5: ekodu dɛ ebɛsɛɛ; osiandɛ enntsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ndze
column6: dɛ ibedzi ne mbransɛm nye n’ahyɛdze a ɔhyɛ wo no do:"

column2: "na ɔbɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze
column3: wɔ ɔwo nye w’asefo do daa:"

column2: "osiandɛ ammfa enyigye
column3: nye akoma pa annsom EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column4: wɔ adze nyinara no dodow mu ntsi:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi ebɔsom w’atamfo a EWURADZE bɔsoma hɔn ma wɔaaba wo do no
column3: wɔ ɔkɔm
column6: nye ndzɛmba nyinara ho hia mu: na ɔdze dadze kɔndua bɔto wo kɔn do

column2: "EWURADZE dze ɔman bi befi ekyirekyir efi asaase ano aba wo do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔkɔr tu; ɔman a enntse hɔn kasaa;"

column2: "ɔman a hɔn enyim yɛ hu a wɔmmfɛr akɔdaa enyim
column3: na wɔnnkyerɛ enyimtsewee wɔ aberantsɛ do so:"

column2: "na obedzi wo fiembowa mu aba
column3: na w’asaase do aba
column4: ekodu dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ wo: eso orinngya wo eburow

column2: "Na ɔbɔkɔ wo ntua wɔ wo nkuropon nyinara mu
column3: ekodu dɛ w’afasu atsentsen a ɔyɛ dzen no a edze wo werɛ hyɛ mu no bodwuruw egu famu
column4: wɔ w’asaase nyina do: na ɔbɔkɔ wo ntua wɔ wo nkuropon nyinara a ɔwɔ w’asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze ama wo no nyinara do."

column2: "Na ibedzi woara wo honam mu aba
column3: wo mbabanyin nye wo mbabaa a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze ama wo no hɔn nam; wɔ ntua nye ahokyer a w’atamfo bɛma wo ho akyer wo no mu."

column2: "Ɔbanyin a ɔdwe na ɔwɔ tsema wɔ hom mu no n’enyiwa bɛyɛ bɔn wɔ no nua
column3: nye ne yer a ɔda no bo mu
column4: nye ne mba nkaa a wɔama wɔaka no ho:"

column2: "dɛ ɔremma hɔn mu biara ne mba nam a oridzi no bi
column3: osiandɛ biribiara annka amma no; wɔ ntua nye ahokyer a wo tamfo bɛma wo ho akyer wo wɔ wo nkuropon nyinara mu no mu."

column2: "Hom mu ɔbaa so a ɔdwe na ɔsonsɔn no ho na ɔnam mberɛwyɛ ntsi ɔnnsɔe nnhwɛɛ pɛn dɛ ɔdze n’ananadze bɛka famu no
column3: bɛyɛ nyimpa bɔn wɔ no kun a ɔda no bo mu

column2: "na ɔbɔwe ne mba a ɔbɔwo hɔn no nye ekyiradze no wɔ nsumaa mu: wɔ ahohia a ofi ntua nye ahokyer a wo tamfo bɛma aba wo do wɔ wo nkuropon mu no ntsi."
"Sɛ eronndwen do nnyɛ mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma yi mu
column3: na ennsuro enyimnyam dzin a no ho yɛ hu yi
column7: nye w’asefo yardɔm ayɛ nwanwa; mekyerɛ ɔyardɔm akɛse a ɔkyɛr

column2: "Na ɔdze Egypt yarba no a isuro no nyinara bɛba wo do bio; na ɔabɛfemfam wo ho."
"Eso yarba biara
column3: nye ɔyardɔm biara a wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ mbra yi no nwoma mu no
column4: ɔno na EWURADZE dze bɛba wo do

column2: "Na ɔbɛka hom nyimpa kakrabaabi
column3: naaso nna nkyɛ hom dodow tse dɛ ɔsor nworaba; osiandɛ hom enntsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne ndze."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’enyi gye hom ho dɛ ɔbɛyɛ hom yie
column4: na ɔama hom adɔr no; dɛmara so na EWURADZE n’enyi bɛgye hom ho dɛ ɔbɛma hom ase etu
column5: na ɔasɛɛ hom: na wɔbɛpempan hom efi asaase a hom rokɔ do akɛfa no do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bɔbɔ wo apetse aman nyinara mu
column3: efi asaase ano kor araa ekodu asaase ano kor so; na hɔ na ebɔsom enyame fofor a ɔwo nye w’egyanom nnyim hɔn

column2: "Na amanaman iyinom mu irinnya ahotɔ
column3: na w’ananadze rinnya ahomgye: na EWURADZE bɛma wo ahopopo akoma
column5: nye ɔkra a etwintwam wɔ hɔ:"

column2: "na wo nkwa bɛsɛn ehihim wɔ w’enyim; na ibosuro adzesaa nye adzekyee
column3: na irinnya wo nkwa ho gyedzi biara:"

column2: "anapa ebɛse dɛ
column3: Kɛtseankyɛ ewimbir a: na ewimbir so ebɛse dɛ
column4: Kɛtseankyɛ anapa a: wɔ w’akoma mu suro a ibosuro
column5: nye w’enyiwa do adze a ibohu no ntsi."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze ahɛn dze wo bɛsan akɔ Egypt
column3: wɔ ɔkwan a mekaa wo ho asɛm dɛ irunnhu bio no do: na hɔ na hom bɔtontɔn homho ama hom atamfo ayɛ nkowaa nye mfonabaa
